name: Space Evolver
description:
Controls:

A and D keys -> Move Left and Right

Left Mouse Click -> Shoot common lasers

Right Mouse Click -> Laser Beam When Level 2 and has laser ammo (blue gauge)

Space -> Pause Game

Objectives:

Collect green bolts to evolve your ship, when you reach max level and filll the level gauge (green) you win the game.

You die if your health gauge (red) reaches zero.

Gauges:

Red -> Health

Green -> Experience

Blue -> Laser Ammo
